attributes.action: Police should be on patrol throughout the country to lower crime rates
attributes.additional_details: We should put police on patrol throughout the country not only would it make it people feel safer when going outside but also it would lower the crime rate making not only British citizens but tourists safer when coming to the country
attributes.background: We should put police on patrol wherever we can do then England can be a safer place

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about policing are a matter for individual police forces, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Fund increase in police officers in line with population: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/618553
